# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.

# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.

# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only

# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.

# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

add_executable(external_sources-object_storage-inference-ut)


target_link_libraries(external_sources-object_storage-inference-ut PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  library-cpp-cpuid_check
  cpp-testing-gtest
  cpp-testing-gtest_main
  udf-service-stub
  external_sources-object_storage-inference
  core-external_sources-object_storage
  core-tx-scheme_board
  common-http_gateway-mock
)

target_allocator(external_sources-object_storage-inference-ut
  cpp-malloc-tcmalloc
  libs-tcmalloc-no_percpu_cache
)

target_link_options(external_sources-object_storage-inference-ut PRIVATE
  -ldl
  -lrt
  -Wl,--no-as-needed
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -lpthread
  -lrt
  -ldl
)

target_sources(external_sources-object_storage-inference-ut PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/external_sources/object_storage/inference/ut/arrow_inference_ut.cpp
)


add_test(
  NAME
  external_sources-object_storage-inference-ut
  COMMAND
  external_sources-object_storage-inference-ut
)

set_property(
  TEST
  external_sources-object_storage-inference-ut
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  SMALL
)

set_property(
  TEST
  external_sources-object_storage-inference-ut
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
)

vcs_info(external_sources-object_storage-inference-ut)

set_property(
  TEST
  external_sources-object_storage-inference-ut
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
